Posts.Content: Hi had GP out today because of light headiness and dizziness . Blood pressure ok , got to drink plenty and rest it's from the anaesthetic . Which will take a week to get out of my system apparently xx Xx
Posts.Title: Op

Posts.Content: Had my lumpectomy on Friday . Had to stay in overnight as no one at home with me as lost my hubby last year . And i have fibromyalgia . Had a very rude young nurse who had me in tears . Only one lymph node taken so haven't spread , but am rather sore and some pain under arm . My blood pressure was low on my going home from the hospital , and I keep going very light headed and dizzy . Don't know if I'm meant to get it checked or not . Going back on the 16th to get the results , then depending on them will start chemo .
Posts.Title: Op

Posts.Content: Hi thanks for replying No I have no one that can stay , but do belong to a wifows group who are brilliant and they do pop in end check on me .. It's just all getting to much really I am going bits around the house friends are coming and doing it for me and telling me off . But I can't just sit here and do nothing Xx just all to much , loosing my love , cancer now been made redundant and worrying about finding a new job
Posts.Title: Op

Posts.Content: Thanks Kate U belong to a widows group and they pop in and see me . I'm only 49 and finding all this to much really . My breast care nurse is on holiday at the moment and not back until the 15th. I have been doing to much since coming home in Saturday . Tidying up etch , my friends have been doing it and telling me off but I just can't sit and look at it and I have a plumber in putting in a walk in shower so there is dust etch. But my disability is hard without my hubby and I can't get in and out if the bath . U got jade redundant last week and have now also got the worry of bring out of work and finding s new job . Xxx
Posts.Title: Op

Posts.Content: More About Me Female Hello I'm 49 recently list my husband to hodgkins very suddenly aged 51 . I am disabled with fibromyalgia and my mobility is very badly affected . I have just been diagnosed with grade three breast cancer and due to have my op on the 5th July in the royal Berkshire hospital . Then chemo end radio therapy . I am petrified , I have the widows group I belong to that have helped me so much with my grief and are being there for me on this road to . Are there any people in the reading area
Posts.Title: Neely diagnosed

Posts.Content: Hi Hun , I to have grade 3 . Triple negative. . I turned 50 on Wednesday . I had two lumpectomies as they didn't get it all the first time . I'm due to start chemo on Wednesday 8 sessions then radiotherapy. My husband passed away very suddenly in jan 2012 and I'm still trying to cope with that , my children are grown 32 and 31 with children of there own and live nearly an hours drive away . I'm petrified , and so alone . I don't know where you are I'm in berkshire . And very happy to chat if u would like to . Take care Hun xxx
Posts.Title: Feeling sad and alone :(

Posts.Content: Hi I have grade 3 triple negative . Have had two lumpectomies and about to start FEC-T eight session on Wednesday . I've just turned 50 and lost my husband jan 2012 , I live alone and am disabled . I'm do scared of doing this alone . I have posted to see if anyone Is in my area but it doesn't seem there is . It must be so hard with small children . I hope they can sort out the sickness for u Take care
Posts.Title: For anyone about to start or going through chemo.....

Posts.Content: Thank u , ill call by them tomorrow
Posts.Title: Advise

Posts.Content: Is it normal after a lumpectomy to have a hard large lump where the op took place ???
Posts.Title: Advise

Posts.Content: I have a Mossi bite on my right foot , the side of my lymph removal. It is inflamed . Is it just the arm that if u getting cuts , bites etc u need to get antibiotics straight away or any part of ur body Really don't know
Posts.Title: Mossi bite help needed
